query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `company_users` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `companyId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `companyRole` enum('company_admin', 'project_manager', 'editor', 'viewer') NOT NULL,
  `invitedBy` int,
  `invitedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `acceptedAt` timestamp,
  `status` enum('active', 'inactive', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `company_users_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_company_user` (`companyId`, `userId`),
  INDEX `idx_user_companies` (`userId`),
  INDEX `idx_company_role` (`companyId`, `companyRole`)
);
command:

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `companyId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `companyRole` enum('company_admin', 'project_manager', 'editor', 'viewer') NOT NULL,
  `invitedBy` int,
  `invitedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `acceptedAt` timestamp,
  `status` enum('active', 'inactive', 'pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `company_users_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  INDEX `idx_company_user` (`companyId`, `userId`),
  INDEX `idx_user_companies` (`userId`),
  INDEX `idx_company_role` (`companyId`, `companyRole`)
);
